agents.commodities.atfm_regulation.ATFMRegulation¶

class agents.commodities.atfm_regulation.ATFMRegulation(location, capacity_periods=None, reason='C', env=None, uid=None)¶

Bases: object

This user a booker with capacity=1 to avoid that the queue is changed concurrently. Anything modifying the assigment of the queue should provide a request.
